Maintaining international cooperation across all stakeholders will be especially important for vaccine research and development, which can be a rather lengthy and complex process.

68 Various approaches are already being pursued to speed up and support the clinical-trial process, such as the use of remote clinical trials, e-consent, and direct-to-patient delivery of investigational medicinal products. However, strengthened international regulatory cooperation with stakeholders not only should be limited to the current pandemic but also must persist even postpandemic.
